Profiency Bonus
This item grants its wearer profiency in all weapons and armor.
Slip Resistant
Cannot slip on ice or grease.
You gain the following spells:

Magic Armor, Unlimited Create Water, Inflict Ranged Wounds, Scorching Ray of Radiance, Speak with Animals, Detect Thoughts, Radiance of the Dawn, False Education, Speak with Dead, Squad Heal, Spell Recovery, Feather Fall, Gloves of Teleportation, Freezing Magic Missile, Psychic Radiance, Shocking Eldritch Blast and Squad Cleanse.
Universal Magic Armor

The stats of this armor are based on your armor proficiency, dexterity and level. Base AC is 11 + Dex modifier. If you have medium armor proficiency, you gain extra +2 to AC. The stats increase at levels 4, 7 and 10.
At level 4 you gain +1 to AC. At level 7 you gain +1 to all ability scores. At level 10 you gain +1 to AC.
Magic Force Weapon
This magical force weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 3, 5 and 7.
At level 3 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus and 1d4 force damage. At level 5 the force damage increases to 1d6. At level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2
Magic Psychic Weapon
This magical psychic weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 3, 5 and 7.
At level 3 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus and 1d4 psychic damage. At level 5 the psychic damage increases to 1d6. At level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2
Magic Radiant Weapon
This magical radiant weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 3, 5 and 7.
At level 3 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus and 1d4 radiant damage. At level 5 the radiant damage increases to 1d6. At level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2
Magic Cold Weapon
This magical cold weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 3, 5 and 7.
At level 3 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus and 1d4 cold damage. At level 5 the cold damage increases to 1d6. At level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2
Magic Fire Weapon
This magical fire weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 3, 5 and 7.
At level 3 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus and 1d4 fire damage. At level 5 the fire damage increases to 1d6. At level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2
Magic Slashing Weapon
This magical slashing weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 3, 5 and 7.
At level 3 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus and 1d4 slashing damage. At level 5 the slashing damage increases to 1d6. At level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2
Proficiency and Level Based Stats

The stats of this armor are based on your class, dexterity and level. Base AC is 11 + Dex modifier. Barbares, Clerics, Druides and Rôdeurs gain extra +2 to AC. Guerriers and Paladins gain extra +1 to AC. The stats increase at levels 3, 6 and 9.
At level 3 all classes gain +1 to AC. At level 6 all classes gain +1 to all ability scores. At level 9 all classes gain +1 to AC.
Shocking Eldritch Blast
Conjure a beam of crackling and shocking energy.
Freezing Magic Missile
Create three projectiles of freezing cold force magic.
Scorching Ray of Radiance
Hurl four rays of radiant fire at your enemies.
Psychic Radiance
Harness the power of your mind to deal Psychic damage to hostile creatures.
Spell Recovery
Whenever you are not in combat, you can replenish expended spell slots, which allow you to cast spells.
Spell Recovery: 1st Level
Recover all level 1 spell slots.
Spell Recovery: 2nd Level
Recover all level 2 spell slots.
Spell Recovery: 3rd Level
Recover all level 3 spell slots.
Complete Spell Recovery
Recover all spell slots.
Mask of the Shapeshifter
Magically disguise yourself and change all aspects of your appearance.
